price: Kuna da waɗansu abũbuwan amfãni* a cikinta (dabbar hadaya) har ya zuwa ga wani ajali ambatacce, sa'an nan kuma wurin halattãta zuwa ga ¦ãkin 'yantacce ne.
arabic: لَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗى ثُمَّ مَحِلُّهَآ إِلَى ٱلۡبَيۡتِ ٱلۡعَتِيقِ
footnotes: * Anã amfãni da dabbar hadaya wajen hawa sabõda larũra da shan nõno har a kai ga wurin sõke ta. Anã sõke hadaya a cikin hurumin Makka.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lakum fīhā manāfiʿu ilā ajalin musamman thumma maḥilluhā ilā al-bayti al-ʿatīqi
